title.rendered: Dean Dickson puts the Dick in Dickson

content.rendered: In 2000 Northridge High School art teacher Dean Dickson created the four logos pictured for his school. In the last year, the school has had to repurpose his logos in different ways or add new logos. Dickson was not pleased with the way the logos were changed nor the additions and asked the school to either buy out the rights to the logos for more than $60,000 or stop using them. After lawyers got involved, the school settled to pay Dickson $21,500 and to remove all of his logos within a year. Dickson copyrighted the logos in 2010 so he does own them but, c'mon, bullying your own school for messing up your shitty logos? Dick move.
